comment: Great lectures! Easy to understand explanations for beginner. Do you have lectures on SNPs, CNV?
Because of your lecture I am the smartest guy in our class 😂. Thank you
Intersting lecture. Is it possible to get the slides of the course ?
thank you so much. perfect revision b4 interview. love from india
Dr Thomas, is there a lecture explaining homeodomain, zinc finger domain and high mobility group

I like the way you use the analogy of Icecream maker, food grinder etc to make the concepts of alternative splicing clear :D  Your teaching style makes me enjoy watching your lectures so much and also, you always get to explain the concepts really clearly! :D ♥👍
Wow....the kind of  conceptual  clearity I got is simply amazing. Lots of love and  thanks from India.
